com.github.wuic.util
Class IOUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.github.wuic.util.IOUtils

public final class IOUtils
extends Object

Utility class built on top of the java.io package helping WUIC to deal with I/O.

Since:
0.3.1
Version:
1.1
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

close

public static void close(Closeable closeable)

Tries to close the given object and log the IOException at INFO level to make the code more readable when we assume that the IOException won't be managed.

Also ignore null parameters.

Parameters:
closeable - the object to close

deleteDirectory

public static void deleteDirectory(File directory)
                            throws IOException

Deletes a directory. Begins by delete the files inside the directory recursively.

Parameters:
directory - directory to delete
Throws:
IOException - if a file could not be deleted

Reads the given reader and returns its content in a String.

Parameters:
reader - the reader
Returns:
the content
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs

                                      OutputStream output)

Throws:

                                      Writer writer,
                                      String cs)
                               throws IOException

Copies the data from the given input stream into the given writer.

Parameters:
is - the InputStream
writer - the Writer

lookupFileResources

public static List<String> lookupFileResources(File file,
                                               Pattern pattern)
                                        throws IOException

Checks if a given file could be or contains a resource matching the specified pattern.

Supports research through directory and ZIP archives.

Parameters:
file - the file to check
pattern - the pattern to match
Returns:
the matching paths
Throws:
IOException - if any I/O error occurs while reading file

lookupArchiveResources

                                                  Pattern pattern)
                                           throws IOException

Looks up for an entry matching the given pattern in the specified zip file.

Parameters:
zipFile - the zip file to read
pattern - the pattern to match
Returns:
the matching paths
Throws:
IOException - if any I/O error occurs while reading the archive

lookupDirectoryResources

public static List<String> lookupDirectoryResources(File directory,
                                                    Pattern pattern)
                                             throws IOException

Looks up a file with a name matching the given pattern if the specified directory.

Parameters:
directory - the directory
pattern - the pattern
Returns:
the matching paths
Throws:
IOException - if the given file is not a directory
